data.name: BIGFOOT - WEAPON SKINS "BLOODY GHOST"
data.detailed_description:
Decorate your weapon with the BLOODY GHOST skin pack.

There are 5 skins available in this pack for the following weapons:
  • AWM
  • M4
  • Remington 700
  • Remington 850
  • Glock

Skins can be selected at the lobby stage using the drop-down list next to your character.
data.about_the_game:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10, 11 (Only 64bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3 8130U(2Cores, 2.3GHz) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11 (Only 64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 (64bit) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
